result.eng: I can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.orig: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.html: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom an túr a ḟeiceáil tá cnoc sa ḃealaċ ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.orig: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.html: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: Ṫug túr ṫeas an Lárionad Trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
